attributes.long-description:
Are you bored on your Summer holidays? What would you say for a bundle of 3 fantastic games? Some music, a bit of puzzle and a lot of running for an unbeatable Summer price! Everyone can find his game here. The package contains:

- I Must Run! - Jump over gaps in prison buildings, run through a metro station and test your reflexes in a deadly run over construction yard cranes. Reach the city center and save your wife. Remember, you have only 24 hours. You must run!

- Boom Beats - lets you enter compelling worlds full of club tunes: drum and bass, jungle, dubstep, rave and house. All you need to do is tap the rhythm and earn the score. Use multipliers, unlocks, special powers and more. Headphones are recommended.

- Block Cascade Fusion - Do you like falling blocks? Are you ready for the fusion? If yes, just sit down and fall into the world of falling blocks, match them properly and... just wait for the fusion that sweeps them away rewarding you with .

attributes.name: Gamelion Summer Minis Bundle 2011
